name: Lost in Verglas
description:
Lost in Verglas

You find yourself crash landed on a foreign world without any way home. You're only option is to repair your ship at any cost. The people here call themselves Whisps. Are they dangerous? Will they help me? Figure out how to repair your ship so you can leave this strange world.

Controls:
  • Spacebar - JUMP
  • Esc - Exit game
  • Tab -  Toggle windowed mode
  • Left-click - Interact
  • Right-click - Always face the same direction

Programming & Art by  StoreboughtRocketGames

Music by Luminous Music
